name: Homological conjectures in commutative algebra
rephrased: If a commutative ring R is a homomorphic image of a Gorenstein ring and S is a direct summand of R as an R-module, then S is also a homomorphic image of a Goren'tstein ring.
implication_form: If R is a homomorphic image of a Gorenstein ring and S is a direct summand of R as an R-module, then S is a homomorphic image of a Gorenstein ring.
